item.title: VSCode and Tiny Instances over Remote SSH
item.description: VSCode is very popular Link to heading A lot of people like VSCode, 74% of respondents in StackOverflow’s 2022 Developer Survey said that VSCode is the IDE that they’ve used in the past year and also plan to keep using it. Why is VSCode liked so, and what do people like about it is not the focus of the post; but for sure it has to do with its extendable functionality, much of which comes from extensions.
